General.Name: Shandong Linuo Technical Glass Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Shandong Linuo Technical Glass Co.,Ltd. engages in the development, production, and sale of special glass products in the People's Republic of China. It offers pharmaceutical packaging products, such as molded glass vials/bottles, neutral and low borosilicate ampoule, tubular neutral and low borosilicate vials, borosilicate tubing, and double point ampoule; and kitchen glass products, including baking dish, measuring jug, casserole, mixing bowl with PP lid, baby food container, glass storage with compartment, and leakproof and knife/fork lid, lid with air vent, flat rims, and buldge top rim, as well as glass storage with one touch, detachable, frost finish, and simple lid. The company also provides optical glass comprising various bulbs, glass tubing, and PAR products, as well as lens for LED lamps. In addition, it offers heat resistance and electric lighting glass products. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Jinan, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: Government Resident of Yuhuangmiao Town, Jinan, China, 251604
